click: click each item to see more information
rekalogi: Rekalogi is a dynamic software house based in Bandung, where he had the opportunity to intern as a Project Manager. During his time there, he gained hands-on experience in managing projects and learned about the result-based management system. It was a pivotal experience that deepened his understanding of project workflows and effective outcome-driven strategies.
docheck: At DoCheck, he built the admin dashboard from the scratch using ReactJS and TypeScript to manage the to-do list app. He also managed and optimized the company profile on WordPress, implementing SEO strategies and integrating Google Analytics to boost visibility and user engagement. His work not only streamlined backend operations but also elevated the company's online presence and performance.
avana: At Avana, a social commerce company based in Malaysia, he managed and enhanced 3 websites using ReactJS, Redux, and Bulma within a Scrum framework with 2-week sprint cycles. He played a key role in integrating shipping functionalities with third-party services and created a comprehensive component library using Storybook. These contributions improved site performance and user experience.
lerero: At Lerero, an educational company with bases in Romania and Australia, he was part of the Scrum development team. He was responsible for two websites; Learning Management System (LMS) and Marketplace. He utilized Next.js and styled-components in his work, and applied custom hooks as a coding pattern to enhance functionality and maintainability.
